    • getReward

      public ScoringToken getReward(Player player) throws CannotCollectRewardException
      This method give to the player his scoring token as a reward for completing the goal
      Parameters:
      player - it's one of the players
      Returns:
      the scoringToken with the max points available at the moment if the player has completed the goal and hasn't alredy collected the reward
      Throws:
      CannotCollectRewardException - if the player has alredy collected the reward or if he hasn't completed the goal yet
